__e: I've got a house I gotta get ready to show for tomorrow.
It took a little horse trading to get you here, but it's plain as potatoes to me now.
Well, there are negotiations to go to New York.
I mean, negotiations are still ongoing.
Why is it that for once I know exactly what you're talking about?
I realize how important these talks are to Bajor but, as your physician, my duty is to you first.
I think we need front-channel negotiations.
I don't buy these bullshtak peace talks, not for one second. No.
The Leader is coming here himself... to take direct charge of the peace negotiations.
Here we are, about to open negotiations with an important new client and this is the welcome you're prepared to give him?
I had promised your father you and the firm help after his death.
He's bragged about the negotiations rather carelessly.
Yeah, there's still some negotiating to do.
In all our negotiating... about how this relationship would work, don't you think we skipped a step?
No, there is the question of whether your negotiations have borne fruit.
I put them in contact, negotiations went ahead... But in the end, I never got a penny.
Negotiations have always taken longer than arms.
